short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn OneDrive share links into direct download URLs. Copy, paste, and get instant links for images, PDFs, and more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify your OneDrive sharing experience with OneDrive Direct download link generator! This powerful Chrome extension transforms shareable One Drive URLs into direct download links for non-native files like images, PDFs, and more.

Key Features:
• Easy URL Conversion: Copy any OneDrive share link, paste it into Direct Download link generator, and get an instant direct download URL.
• Streamlined Workflow: Perfect for quickly sharing downloadable links without the OneDrive preview page.
• Wide File Support: Works with images, PDFs, documents
• Time-Saver: Eliminate extra clicks and speed up your file sharing process.
• Privacy-Focused: No data storage – your files and links remain secure.

How it works:

Copy the shareable OneDrive URL for your file
Paste the URL into the Drive Direct extension
Instantly receive a direct download link

For more instructions please check:  https://mokachat.com/onedrive-download-link-generator 

Ideal for:

• Professionals sharing documents with clients
• Educators distributing materials to students
• Designers sending image files to collaborators
• Anyone who frequently shares non-native files from Google Drive

With Drive Direct, you're always just a copy-paste away from a direct download link. Streamline your One Drive sharing and save time with every file. Download the extension now and experience effortless file sharing!"
